# genderBR

[![CRAN_Status_Badge](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/genderBR)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=genderBR)
[![Package-License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL%20%28%3E=%202%29-brightgreen.svg?style=flat)](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)

`genderBR` predicts gender from Brazilian first names using data from Brazilian Electoral Supreme Court and Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatistica's API.


## Installing

To install the package development version, use:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("meirelesff/genderBR")
```
